name: tiny little boat
description:
Float your tiny little boat and indulge yourself in this zen experience.

Controls

Use W, A, S, D or Up, Down, Left, Right to float the boat.


Credits

Created in a week by Nikhil Jolly for WeeklyGameJam 16.

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org

Special Thanks to Peayush Bhardhwaj
